item.title: Publications
item.description: All our publications are published under open licenses. If you are unable to locate a copy, please contact us and we will be happy to send it to you. 2022 Egloff W 2022. FAIR Works – Eckpunkte eines Urheberrechts für die digitale Welt. Sic!, 2022, 405–424. doi: 10.5281/zenodo.7184216 Egloff W 2022. FAIR Works - Cornerstones for a Copyright in the Digital World. Sic!, 2022, 405–424. doi: 10.5281/zenodo.7181457 (english translation of doi: 10.
